project_metadata.title: Electronic Barangay Health Management System (E-BHM Connect)
project_metadata.subtitle: An Integrated ICT Solution of Barangay Health Management Access in Brgy. Bacong, Dumangas Iloilo
project_metadata.institution: Iloilo State University of Fisheries Science and Technology - Dumangas Campus

chapter_1.title: Introduction
chapter_1.project_context: Transitioning from manual, paper-based record-keeping to a web-based system to address inaccessibility, inadequate data treatment, and inefficient record keeping.
objectives: Digitize and securely manage patient health records for accurate tracking.
Streamline consultations and health program reporting.
Implement automated SMS notifications for health information dissemination.
Evaluate system usability, functionality, and reliability using ISO 25010:2011.
scope: Patient health records management (registration, consultation, diagnosis, referrals).
limitations: Requires stable internet connection (offline access is limited).

chapter_3.title: Technical Background, Methodology and Procedures
functional_requirements: Responsive Design (Adapts to different screen sizes).

features: Manage sections (Uploads, Chat Queries, Create Test)

hipo_structure.core_processes: Admin notifications, SMS broadcasting, Dashboard management, Interactive forms
hipo_structure.database_interaction: Storing user data, health services, FAQs
hipo_structure.output: Customized dashboard views, Real-time notifications, Reports

workflows.login_flow: User inputs credentials -> System verifies against Database -> If success, redirect to Dashboard -> If fail, show error.

chapter_4.title: Presentation, Analysis, and Interpretation

implemented_features.functionality: Create, retrieve, update, and delete accounts (CRUD) with secure access.

visual_assets: Landing Page (Home, Announcements, Mission/Vision, Contact Us)

revision_notes_from_text.framework_conflict: Text mentions Laravel on page 20, but Vanilla PHP on page 19. User comment on page 29 explicitly requests removal of Laravel mentions.
revision_notes_from_text.testing: Blackbox testing mention removed; focus on orienting admin before start.
revision_notes_from_text.offline_capability: Conflict noted in text: Methodology says offline compatible, but limitations say internet required. Needs verification.
